vooga.towerdefense.util

Class Pixmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.util.Pixmap

  • public class Pixmap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an image on the screen and adds some utility functions to the Image class. Note, Java only supports the formats: png, jpg, gif.
    Author:
    Robert C. Duvall, Dagbedji F, edited by Elder M. Yoshida and Xu Rui.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pixmap(Pixmap other)
      Create a copy of image from the given other image.
      Pixmap(java.lang.String filePath)
      Create an image from the given path including filename.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pixmap

        public Pixmap(java.lang.String filePath)
        Create an image from the given path including filename. The file "path" is the relative resource location from the source "src". If filePath = "/"+pictureFileNameIncludingFileType, this object will look for a .png/.jpg/.gif file inside src.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Relative resource location including its fileName. Example: filePath = "/" + "car.png" will look for an image car.png in the src folder.

      • Pixmap

        public Pixmap(Pixmap other)
        Create a copy of image from the given other image.
        Parameters:
        other - A Pixmap to be copied.

    • Method Detail

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String filePath)
        Set this image to the image referred to by the given filename.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Relative resource location including its fileName. Example: filePath = "/" + "car.png" will look for an image car.png in the src folder.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D pen,
         java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
         java.awt.Dimension size)
        Describes how to draw the image on the screen.
        Parameters:
        pen - A Graphics2D object that allows the picture to be painted.
        center - A Point2D for the location of the center of the picture to be painted.
        size - The size (width, length) of the image.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D pen,
         java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
         java.awt.Dimension size,
         double angle)
        Describes how to draw the image rotated on the screen.
        Parameters:
        pen - A Graphics2D object that allows the picture to be painted.
        center - A Point2D for the location of the center of the picture to be painted.
        size - The size (width, length) of the image.
        angle - The angle in radians!
